annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (90-day) addition of subchapter II-B [1981 Ed.], see notes following § 2-217.01.
For temporary (90 day) repeal of section, see § 2382(b) of Fiscal Year 2006 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2005 (D.C. Act 16-168, July 26, 2005, 52 DCR 7667).
